mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DIARY WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT DIARY_NUMBER, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE)AS CREATE_DATE, D.STATUS, NICKNAME FROM DIARY D JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND D.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DIARY_NUMBER DESC
SELECT DIARY_NUMBER, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, d.STATUS, NICKNAME FROM DIARY d JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE DIARY_NUMBER = #{diaryNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
